definition: a game in which iron rings or open iron rings are thrown at a stake in the ground in the hope of encircling it
details:
noun
- a game in which iron rings or open iron rings are thrown at a stake in the ground in the hope of encircling it
= example: a game in which iron rings or open iron rings are thrown at a stake in the ground in the hope of encircling it
= synonyms: quoits
